description: Identifies the units in which the question's answer should be captured.

element.definition: Identifies the units in which the question's answer should be captured.

mapping.map: N/A - MIF rather than RIM level

name: Unit of measure for question

element.definition: Identifies the units in which the question's answer should be captured.

mapping.map: N/A - MIF rather than RIM level

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
